com.nttdocomo.ui
Interface MediaListener

All Superinterfaces:
EventListener
public interface MediaListener
extends EventListener

This defines the media event listener. It designates the interface that shall be implemented by the object that is to receive events such as the status notification from the media presenter.

See Also:
MediaPresenter

Method Summary
 void mediaAction(MediaPresenter source, int type, int param)
          This receives notifications from the media presenter.
 

Method Detail

mediaAction

public void mediaAction(MediaPresenter source,
                        int type,
                        int param)
This receives notifications from the media presenter.

Parameters:
source - Media presenter that is the source of the notification is passed.
type - Event type is passed.
param - Event parameter is passed. The meaning of the parameter varies from event to event. Zero is sent when an event does not have a parameter.
